pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, May 5, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, May 5, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Union des municipalités du Québec.

Delta Hotel
Strauss Room
475 Président-Kennedy Avenue
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Cameras and photographers should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister, accompanied by the Minister of International Development and La Francophonie, Marie-Claude Bibeau, will make an announcement and hold a media availability.

Montréal City Hall
510 Gosford Street entrance
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 10:00 a.m.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting of the Prime Minister’s Youth Council.

William Grey Hotel
421 St. Vincent Street
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Cameras and photographers should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Vaisakhi dinner celebration.

Closed to media
